item.title: About Me
item.description: A coffee lover, film buff, and a big tennis fan. You bet I chose to be a Melburnian because this city hosts the Australian Open! Reading and running also keep me busy and fulfilled these days. A dreamer and a doer. The past ten years in the accounting and finance field before switching to tech recently. This is my cyber home, full with my random thoughts and stupid poems.

item.title: Love is not fair on its own
item.description: Love is not fair on its own Like the dark side of the Moon The scale tilts to the side Where hearts with heavy desire reside Countless plays abide by one rule One soul on fire — Till it cools A burning gaze — Rests upon a nameless bloom Scorched — Descending into the tomb
